---
title: The Deltic Group
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: the_deltic_group
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $885.8K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with The Deltic Group. The average
  contract duration was 2.91 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $739.5K. The longest
  contract was 7 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.3M.
lookup_name: 'THE DELTIC GROUP'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '885.8K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '40%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-48%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-949.7K'
s424_mean_duration: '2.91'
s421_mean_contract_value: '739.5K'
s425_max_duration: '7'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.3M'
---
